page.title: 17Sports Day.
page.content: One o'clock and we are putting the sports equipment outside and chairs for our parents.Thursday 5th July, a hot sunny day and we are ready for our sports day.All the children are in animal teams,races start at 1.45 with a {hoop race},we all line up and when the whistle blows run and bowl a hoop to the finish,our parents cheer.If you win you are given a gold or silver badge.The {sack race}is good fun,everyone must hop and jump along inside a sack,my friend Jane won the {bucket and bean bag}but she is not as fast as Claire who won the{sprint. At the end there is a{toddlers race and we all cheer. Our headmistress gives them all a sweet.After the race we have icecream.Sportsday is really good fun.
